title: Unable to install League on new windows 10 computer (MS visual c++ error)
body: I am not able to install league of legends on my new computer i keep having the same error pop up when the installer attempts to install Microsoft visual studios 2005 c++ i have tried several different suggestions that i found online but none of them have worked. Looking for any help at all.

replies.body:
I see this often with new rigs, and it's usually due to an outdated Windows that doesn't have the necessary products yet.  Upgrading your Windows can fix this up, but you can also download [Visual C+++++++ here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  Hope that helps!
